description: Production monitoring dashboard for Parse DMARC - Email domain reputation monitoring

panels.description: Overall DMARC compliance rate across all monitored domains (0-100%)
panels.title: DMARC Compliance Rate

panels.description: Total number of email messages analyzed across all DMARC reports
panels.title: Total Messages Analyzed

panels.description: Total number of DMARC reports stored in the database
panels.title: Total Reports

panels.description: Time since the last successful IMAP fetch operation
panels.title: Time Since Last Fetch

panels.description: Number of unique source IP addresses and domains sending email on behalf of monitored domains
panels.title: Unique Sources

panels.description: Rate of reports being fetched, parsed, and stored per second
panels.title: Report Processing Rate

panels.description: Distribution of SPF (Sender Policy Framework) authentication results
panels.title: SPF Results

panels.description: Distribution of DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) authentication results
panels.title: DKIM Results

panels.description: Distribution of messages by DMARC policy disposition (what action receivers took)
panels.title: Messages by Disposition

panels.description: DMARC compliance rate per monitored domain
panels.title: Compliance by Domain

panels.description: Top 10 organizations sending DMARC reports (Google, Microsoft, Yahoo, etc.)
panels.title: Reports by Organization

panels.description: Number of messages analyzed per monitored domain
panels.title: Messages by Domain

panels.description: Rate of successful vs failed IMAP connection attempts
panels.title: IMAP Connection Rate

panels.description: Histogram heatmap of IMAP connection establishment duration
panels.title: IMAP Connection Duration

panels.description: Rate of fetch cycles and fetch errors over time
panels.title: Fetch Cycles & Errors

panels.description: Histogram heatmap of report fetch operation duration
panels.title: Fetch Duration

panels.description: Rate of parse and storage errors in report processing
panels.title: Processing Errors

panels.description: Cumulative counts of all error types
panels.title: Total Error Counts

panels.description: HTTP request rate by endpoint and status code
panels.title: HTTP Request Rate by Endpoint

panels.description: HTTP request latency percentiles (p50, p90, p99)
panels.title: HTTP Latency Percentiles

panels.description: HTTP error rate (4xx and 5xx responses) by endpoint
panels.title: HTTP Error Rate

panels.description: Number of HTTP requests currently being processed
panels.title: HTTP Requests In-Flight

panels.description: Number of active goroutines
panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description: Memory allocation statistics from Go runtime
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Garbage collection pause duration and frequency
panels.title: GC Duration Rate

panels.description: Process CPU and memory resource consumption
panels.title: Process CPU Usage

panels.description: Number of open file descriptors
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description: Current running version of Parse DMARC
panels.title: Version

title: Parse DMARC
